mapper.select: SELECT dn_seq,dn_loc, mb_id, dn_title, dn_content, dn_create_at, dn_update_at FROM jsp.donate order by dn_update_at desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO jsp.donate ( dn_loc, dn_title, dn_content, mb_id ) VALUES ( #{dnLoc}, #{dnTitle}, #{dnContent}, #{mbId} )

INSERT INTO jsp.dnfiles ( dn_seq, mb_id, up_original_file_name, up_new_file_name, up_file_path, up_file_size ) VALUES ( #{dnSeq}, #{mbId}, #{upOriginalFileName}, #{upNewFileName}, #{upFilePath}, #{upFileSize} )
mapper.update: UPDATE jsp.donate SET dn_seq=#{dnSeq}, mb_id=#{mbId}, dn_loc=#{dnLoc}, dn_title=#{dnTitle}, dn_content=#{dnContent}, dn_update_at=now() WHERE dn_seq=#{dnSeq}

UPDATE jsp.dnfiles SET dn_seq=#{dnSeq}, mb_id=#{mbId}, up_original_file_name=#{upOriginalFileName}, up_new_file_name=#{upNewFileName}, up_file_path=#{upFilePath}, up_file_size=#{upFileSize} WHERE dn_seq=#{dnSeq}
